inn1.comm: short of a good length delivery, shaping in a touch - Sehwag gets right behind the line and presents the full face of the bat

bowled 'em! A tad fuller this time, 133.2ks on a sweet spot, swings in and beats Smith's tame forward drive, ball sneaks through bat and pad and crashes into off stump, big wicket, well bowled Zaheer Khan!
good, full, quick ball thats angled across him and then gets some late swing, but Kallis knows where his off stump is and gets a step forward and shoulders arms

GONE! Whoah Nelly! Full, fast and moving away from him, 130.4ks Kallis reaches a long way for it, has a big swish at that and can only nick it through to Tendulkar at first slip! Huge wicket, Zak's back!
good ball, pitched up on a good length and Gibbs stands and pokes at it, ball misses the outside edge of the bat, well bowled
good line, pitches on a good length and seams away, Gibbs lets it pass
full and wide of off stump, 125.3ks Bosman has a big swing but misses, good swing on that ball
this pitches and swings in but Bosman shoulders arms, 128.7ks, wasnt that far from the top of off stump
full outside off stump and wide, 129.8ks called so as well
pitches full outside off stump, some away swing, Bosman shoulders arms
full and straight outside off stump, good line, Bosman shoulders arms yet again
a tad wider this time and Bosman watches it through, not a wide though
full and closer to him, he gets forward and defends into the covers, Kaif fields
full and moving away, Gibbs gets on top of it and defends into the covers, point moves around and fields
good ball, pitches on the stumps and moves away, some bounce and Gibbs chases it
and again, full and moving away, Gibbs has a loose drive and gets beaten
this one's on the stumps and he defends it
full and moving across him, Gibbs not interested and leaves it be
straighter this time and he works that to the left of midwicket for one and gets off the mark, crowd cheers
full outside off stump, he reaches for it and pushes that to point with a call of 'WAIT, WAIT' back to his partner
full outside off stump, left alone
full and wide of off stump, swings away, Gibbs allows it to pass with ease
full and in the zone outside off stump, Gibbs frees the arms and slams that over cover in the air, a chancy shot but effective, and he gets four to his name
too full from Agarkar, and Gibbs pounces on it with a much better shot, a checked drive past mid-off for four more, good stroke
full and swinging away outside off stump, Gibbs decides to leave it alone
full and on the stumps,Bosman stands and defends with a dead bat
moves across him with some nip off the pitch, asking questions of Bosman, whos caught on the crease and withdraws his bat at the last second
pitches on middle and off on a good length, Bosman gets right behind and it and stands tall defending, shows Zaheer the full face of the bat
pitches on a good length with some away swing across Bosman, who shuffles across and plays a back-foot defensive but cant make contact
fuller this time, holds his line and angles one in this time off a back of a length, ball swings in over the top of off stump as Bosman shoulders arms
full and straighter on off stump, Bosman gets behind and defends back to Zaheer, and thats a maiden over
too full, little movement, and Gibbs gets to the pitch of this and drives that handsomely in the gap between cover and point, positive stroke
this one's straighter and closer to the off stump, and Gibbs gets a long way forward and kills the ball with compact front-foot defence
not that full but Gibbs is too good, gets a stride forward and smashes that on the up past a diving Sehwag at mid-off for four more, good, attacking cricket
fuller outside off stump, Gibbs comes forward and defends, ball hits him on the pad but clearly pitched outside the line, Agarkar lets out an elongated appeal but the umpire shakes his head
shot! Full on the pads, he easily flicks that past square leg for four more
and again! Just too full on the legs and Gibbs flicks that past square leg, Kumble moves around from backward square leg and dives, but cant stop the ball, good over for South Africa
good! Pitches on a sweet length and moves across Bosman, who stands and pokes at it and is beaten
straighter this time, Bosman back and across and defends back to Zaheer, shuffles across the crease
lands on a shortish length outside off stump, Bosman stands and pushes that to cover, thats 15 balls and not off the mark yet...pressure
fuller this time outside off stump, Bosman gets on top of it and defends, ball rolls to point
lands on a good length and moves away from him, Zaheer maintaining a good line here, Bosman moves across the stumps and shoulders arms
once more, this pitches outside off stump and moves away, Bosman allows it to pass
full outside off stump, Gibbs gets forward and defends stoically
pitches shorter this time and Gibbs is on top of that, steers it to point with a shout of 'WAIT' to Bosman
pitches outside off stump and moves away, left alone
strays to middle and leg but Gibbs cant time the wristy shot past Harbhajan at square legg
good line, full around off stump and Gibbs comes forward and defends into the covers
full outside the off stump, Gibbs drives hard but cant beat Kaif at cover
pitches outside leg stump and catches Bosman on the pad trying to flick while shuffling, Zaheer appeals but thats clearly outside the line
he gets this one to pitch a tad full and wide of off stump, and Bosman finally opens up with a firm smash on the up past cover-point for four
back of a good length outside off stump, Bosman stands and defends off the back foot, ball rolls to point
pitches on leg stump on a shortish length, Bosman stands and neatly turns that off the hips for one to just wide of Harbhajan at square leg
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Gibbs stands tall on the toes and defends that down into the ground, Kaif swoops in from cover and fields
full on this occasion and Gibbs drives that past mid-off, wasnt timed all that well and the ball slows up for Kumble to give chase and haul it in
short of a length outside off stump, Bosman stands and steers that down to third man for a single
lands on a back of a length spot on off stump, Gibbs stands and defends off the back foot, dead-bat defence and the ball drops at his feet, no single attempted though
shortish on leg stump, tucked off the hips to Harbhajan at square leg and they resist the run
banged in short and Gibbs is quickly into the pull shot, not timed well and the ball rolls out to Kumble on the fence moving around from backward square leg
drifts onto the pads and Gibbs works that past square leg out to Kumble again, jogs down the pitch and receives a long, hard stare from Pathan...not sure what thats for
full on middle and leg but he cant flick that well enough, finds the man at midwicket, end of the over
full outside off stump, Gibbs comes forward and defends
fuller this time and Gibbs drives to Kaif at cover, who dives, misfields, and parries the ball wide of mid-off, Kumble fields and thats a single
streaky! Pitches no off stump and Bosman stands tall and tries to work that past midwicket but gets a leading edge that pops up in the air and lands safely in front of cover

GONE! Full outside off stump, an impetuous Bosman has a full-blooded drive at that, kitchen sink and all, as they say, and can only get a thick edge to Tendulkar at first slip, who jumps up and pouches a good catch moving to his left, Zaheer gets another
full on the stumps, comes forward and defends to mid-off
full outside off stump, pitches and then moves in close to the top of off stump, left alone
pitches on a full length outside off stump, Gibbs comes forward and defends well
full outside off stump, Gibbs comes forward and defends, ball kicks up and raps him on the knuckles
short down leg stump, a poor delivery, and he pulls that down to fine leg for four more
short of a good length outside off stump, he stands and drives to mid-off
fuller this time outside off stump, Gibbs comes onto the front foot and defends, that ball swings late and catches him by surprise, takes the bottom hand of the bat

gone! A rank half-volley outside off stump, begging to be hit, Gibbs gets onto bended knee and can only smack that in the air to Kaif at short extra cover, he takes a simple catch and Gibbs has to go, a tame dismissal
pitches outside leg stump and raps him on the pads as he almost falls over, everyone in blue goes up in appeal but in vain, ball pops up in the air towards point, batsmen cross for the leg bye
pitches on a good length on off stump, defended into the covers
straighter on the stumps, he gets forward and defends, ball takes the inside edge to leg, Zaheer moves across and fields
lands on a back of a length outside off stump, Boucher covers the stumps and tries to work that to midwicket, not timed well
good length delivery outside off stump again, shuffles and defends into the off side
straighter this time, Boucher gets behind it and checks the drive back to Zaheer
too full outside off stump, de Villiers gets forward and square-drives that to backward point
straighter on a good length on the stumps, he gets behind it and defends back to Pathan
fuller this time, striving for the yorker is Pathan, but de Villiers digs that out well for the bowler to pick up in his follow-through

lucky, poor shot! Banged in shorter, de Villiers gets onto the pull shot but takes his eyes off and the bottom hand as well, and the result is a leading edge that pops over Pathan but lands safely to the left of mid-on, no man there and thats a stroke of luck for the batsman
fuller outside off stump, defended back to the bowler
short of a good length ball outside off stump, gets behind it and defends to Kaif at  cover
fizzed up outside off stump, de Villiers comes forward and defends
short outside off stump and skids on, de Villiers cuts hard past backward point for one

how close was that?? Quicker through the air on the stumps, Boucher lunges forward and defends, misses everything and thuds into the pads dead in front of the stumps, a loud appeal from all but umpire Jerling shakes his head, now that looked out
pitches outside leg stump, swept around the corner for one
flighted up, he comes forward and defends
drifting down leg stump, flicked to square leg
short of a good length outside off stump, he stands and defends to cover&
fuller this time outside off stump, defended to point with a loud call of 'NO'
full outside off stump, driven well towards mid-off, where Sehwag lets his bowling mate down with a poor diving effort and allows four
too full and de Villiers punches that dead down the ground, sweet timing, head still, good followthrough, Sehwag gives chase but that had four written all over it
full again, driven to Sehwag at mid-off for a quick single
straighter this time, defended to cover
tossed up, comes onto the front foot and defends
quicker and sliding down leg, defended back to the bowler
tossed up outside off stump, comes forward and drives wide of Kumble, who dives to his left and fields
quicker and flatter into middle and leg, almost a yorker, de Villiers does well to dig it out back to Kumble
too short, spins into him, he drives off the backfoot past point for one out to the sweeper
spinning into the stumps, he comes forward and flicks straight to midwicket, no chance of a run there
short of a good length outside off stump, driven past backward point down to Zaheer at third man, de Villiers want two and Boucher is struggling, but Zaheer's throw is late and theyre safe
drags it short, the ball sits up and de Villiers pulls that past square leg for an imperious four
strives too much this time, too full and wide outside off stump and de Villiers gets onto bended knee and unfirls the drive between point and cover for four more, shot
moves around the wicket, looking to angle that in but drops it short and de Villiers runs that down to Zaheer at third man
short of a length outside off stump and moving in, Boucher stands and works that  to square leg, de Villiers doesnt want the risky single
full outside off stump, checks the drive past Sehwag at mid-off and gets one down to long-off, end of the over
too short, he goes back and drives that to midwicket
flighted into the pads, driven to midwicket
flighted up outside off stump, comes forward and defends
the wrong one, spins into him and catches him going down leg

poor running, and thats out! Tossed up, de Villiers gets to the pitch of it and drives in the gap at cover, calls for the second but Boucher is struggling, Pathan covers good ground, swoops in and fires the throw high over Kumble, who jumps, catches it and drops it down onto the stumps and Boucher is out, ever so marginally
tossed up outside off stump, gets forward and squeezes that wide of backward point and calls for the quick single
too full, too wide, and de Villiers cashes in with a beautiful drive past cover for four, welcome back Ajit, he says!
but Agarkar wins this battle! Shortish outside off stump and de Villiers decides to have a tickle at it and gets a thick edge through to Dhoni, moving to his left, India on a roll!
full delivery outside off stump, he shoulders arms
a good, full length ball outside off stump but Pollock shoulders arms
beauty! Lands on a sweet length and squares up Pollock, who stands leaden-footed and pokes at that, ball just misses shaving the outside edge
good length outside off stump, Pollock stands and steers that to point
tossed up on the stumps, defended to the off side
flatter and straighter, defended to forward short leg
flighted up outside off stump, driven to point for one
flighted on the stumps, Pollock comes forward and kills the spin
looped up outside off stump, slower too, Pollock comes forward and defends, inside edge to forward short leg
quicker on the stumps, Pollock goes back and drives back to Kumble, who moves to his right and collects, tidy over
full outside off stump, left alone with a high raise of the bat
this one's also wide of the stumps and he leaves it be
straighter on the stumps, driven to midwicket for a quick run
a fraction shorter and wider and Pollock flays at it, gets an inside edge past the stumps and down to fine leg for four
full on a good length outside off stump, he comes forward and shoulders arms
good length outside off stump, pitches and sort of stops on him as he comes forward and defends into the covers
tossed up on the stumps, no spin, Kemp comes forward and defends
quicker, flatter, and spinning away this time, Kemp goes back and defends
tossed up, inviting the shot, Kemp gets forward and defends to Kaif at cover
looped up again, Kemp drawn forward and drives to Kaif
quicker on the stumps, Kemp just comes forward and dead bats back to Kumble
flighted, pitches on off and slides in, Kemp beaten on the forward drive and they all go up, but the umpire reckons it was too high, a good, tidy over from Kumble
outside off stump, a good length, Pollock drives that streakily on the up past mid-off for four
fuller this time, Pollock comes forward and drives to cover
short of a good length outside off stump, steered to backward point
short of a good length, a pacier delivery, he goes up on his toes and defends that into the off side
banged in short outside off stump, carries well to Dhoni after Pollock sways out of the way
too full, too straight, and thats clipped past mid-on for four, Agarkar all over the place now, good shot that
tossed up outside off stump, comes onto the front foot and drives to Sehwag at mid-off
tossed up again, Pollock gets to it and drives to Sehwag, but no run this time
quicker through the air, lands on middle and off, Pollock forward in defence
tossed up, goes the other way, raps the pads but that was going down leg
quicker and shorter, Pollock rocks back and pulls but cant beat midwicket
top spinner on the off stump, defended to cover
tossed up outside the off stump, driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
bounce and spin, Kemp pushes forward to defend, ball clips the shoulder of the bat and pops up wide of the fielder at short leg
fuller in length, the one that goes straight on. Pollock is sucked forward and the edge is produced, ball goes high towards Dravid at first slip and he fails to hold on to a very difficult chance
worked away straight to the fielder at midwicket
punched down to mid-off - excellent over so far from Harbhajan
turning in, Kemp goes on the back-foot and tucks it down to fine leg for an easy single
on and around the off stump line. Kemp gets well forward and presents the full face of the bat
driven off the front-foot, straight to the fielder at mid-on
full and on the stumps, Kemp stretches well forward and drives it straight to the fielder at mid-on
full and drifting down the leg side, there was definitely a noise as the ball passed the bat - Dhoni moves across sharply and collects it cleanly - umpire unmoved.
worked away for an easy single
defended watchfully and the ball rolls away towards cover
full length outside off stump, Dravid comes forward and checks the push to de Villiers at cover
defended stretching well forward
worked away with ease
turning in from wide outside the off stump, defended watchfully
gets it wide of the fielder at cover and they scamper through for a single
slightly short and turning in sharply, Pollock gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
turned away off the back-foot to the midwicket region
driven down to long-off, yet another easy single added to the total
fraction short outside the off stump. Pollock leans back and cuts it away well wide of the fielder at backward point
full and on the off stump line, Kemp stretches forward to the pitch of the delivery and taps it back to the bowler
slightly short, not much spin in this one - Kemp once again presents the full face of the bat
width offered and the massive smash goes straight into Kaif at silly point - now you know why it's called 'silly' point.
starts off with a big turner - Pollock works it away in the air to the fine leg region, bit of edge involved
wide outside the off stump and Pollock takes full toll- massive chop and the ball races away through the gap between point and gully
better line and length, defended watchfully
goes back and taps it away on the off side
waits for the ball to turn and gets it away wide of Tendulkar at extra cover
defended on the back-foot
starts off with a seam-up delivery, on the middle and off stump line and Pollock works it away towards midwicket
pitched up on the stumps and Pollock drives it straight back down the track to the long-on region
forced away towards midwicket, no room for a single there
slower delivery - played back to the bowler
another straight drive finds the bowler
dropped! slower ball - full and close to the off stump line, Kemp is drawn into the drive and the ball goes straight back to Tendulkar - fairly easy chance grassed. Kemp lives on
on the middle and leg stump line, Pollock shuffles across a bit and works it away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
drifting on to middle and leg, Kemp wroks it away late - easy single down to fine leg
turning in from wide outside the off stump, Pollock on the front-foot defending
turned away behind square on the leg side
driven into the gap between midwicket and mid-on
tossed up delivery to end the over, Pollock goes back and turns it away well wide of the fielder at short leg
short on middle and leg, worked past square leg for one
driven straight back - all along the ground on this occasion
again bit fuller and Pollock effortlessly flicks it away to deep midwicket
driven back past the bowler to the long-off region, was the quicker one but Kemp picked it up early
punched back
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, bit too wide and Pollock had to reach out for it, good looking drive and the fielder at extra cover is beaten comfortably
defended on the front-foot
short and wide outside the off stump, Pollock rocks back and cuts against the spin, the shot is timed to perfection and the ball races away square on the off side - welcome boundary
goes for the sweep but fails to connect properly
forced away off the front-foot to the cover region
flatter and on the stumps, Kemp stays back and taps it away on the leg side
tucked away behind square on the leg side
nicely driven down to long-on for an easy single
bit of width offered outside the off stump, Pollock leans back and runs it down to third man for a single
quicker delivery, Kemp gets forward and defends it well
down the leg side - possibly the quicker delivery gone wrong
close to the off stump line, Kemp looking to run it down ends up with a thick edge and the ball races away to the third man fence
not exactly in the slot but Kemp stretches well forward and drives it down to long-off
driven back to the bowler - end of a good over for South Africa
punched away towards cover
forced away off the back-foot to the point region
flatter trajectory - Kemp daces down the track to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it straight back over the bowler's head to the long-off fence - clean hit
tucked away behind square - excellent cricket this from Kemp

what an effort! Pollock taps the ball towards short cover and takes off for a single but Kemp sends him back. Dhoni moves across quickly and has a shy at the stumps, Kaif moves in behind the stumps from short leg, stretches across - collects the ball and deflects it into the stumps and Pollock is out by a long way - crucial wicket this.
defended on the back-foot
left alone outside the off stump, turning away from the wicket
quicker and flatter, defended watchfully
driven down to long-off and that brings Hall to the fore
forced away towards cover point, again the Dhoni-Kaif combination comes into play but they needed a direct hit this time around
worked away nicely for  a brace
chop of the back-foot and the ball races away to third man, Pathan's clumsy effort in the deep adds four more to the South African total
driven away past the diving cover fielder
full and on the stumps, nicely driven away to the deep midwicket fence - Hall cashing in on some wayward bowling here
turning in from outside the off stump, defended
again drifting down the leg side and Hall nicely works it away to the fine leg fence - flick of the wrists and the ball raced away. Desperate dive in the deep from Pathan ends in vain
much better line and length, forced away on the leg side
worked away through midwicket - end of an excellent over for South Africa
turned away off the back-foot and Hall pierces the wide gap between mid-on and midwicket
quicker delivery, watchfully played away on the leg side
way down the leg side, Kumble under pressure here
on the stumps - the one that goes straight on, Hall gets right behind the line and presents the full face of the bat
turned away off the back-foot to the midwicket region, fielder moves across quickly and negates the chance of a single
bit of width offered, cut away off the back-foot to deep point - Hall is looking good here
punched back to the bowler and that's the end of a fine spell from the veteran
driven down to mid-off, Agarkar there is bit deep and the batsmen scamper through for a single, Hall runs staright into Karthik who was backing up but no damage done
punched away off the back-foot to the cover region
fraction short and turning in nicely, Hall shuffles across well, gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
waits for the ball to turns and at the last moment taps it away towards short cover
fraction short and once again Harbhajan gets the ball to turn in sharply, Hall is made to defend
starts off with a line and length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Kemp reads it well, gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
again on the middle and off stump line and coming in with the arm, Kemp plays it safe
another dot ball - close to the off stump line and Kemp taps it away towards cover

bit of frustration creeping in? slightly short, Kemp comes down the track and swings hard but fails connect properly - ball clips the inside edge and rolls away on the off side. Hall with an early call and they scamper through for a single
short and on the legs, turned away behind square on the leg side
too full and angling across, bit of a surprise delivery and Kemp fails to connect - ball goes through to the keeper
way down the leg side - good take from Dhoni saves a certain boundary
tossed up and turning in, Hall gets well forward and punches it away towards short cover

Harbhajan continues to bleed - fuller in length and on the middle and leg stump line, Hall quickly gets down on one keen and slog sweeps it to the backward square leg fence. Kept the fine leg fielder interested till the last moment but eventually the ball rolled over the ropes
defended on the back-foot
worked away nicely of the back-foot
played away in the air to the midwicket region - Karthik there fails to hold on to a fairly hard chance - how costly is that going be
good length delivery, driven down to long-off for a single
driven straight back and Zaheer too fails to hold on to a hard chance
short ball and Hall pulls it away to the midwicket region, came bit slow off the turf and Hall had all the time in the world to pick his spot
driven down to long-off - this is excellent cricket from Hall

max! that's the Kemp that we know - touch fuller and on the middle and leg stump line. Kemp makes room,  lines it up nicely and hits through the line. Ball sails over the long-on fence. Made it look easy
bowled from round the wicket and coming in with the angle, Kemp stays back and works it away towards square leg
worked away off the back-foot to the short midwicket region
forced away off the back-foot, easy single to cover
take that! Kemp does it again - tossed up delivery - the waltz down the track and the massive hoick was just perfect, this time the ball sails over the long-off fence
and he gets to his half-century in style. Comes down the track, takes it on the full and drills it past the bowler to the long-off fence - excellent use of the feet.
defended on the back-foot
tossed up and Kemp punches it down to wide long-on for a brace - 14 of the over so far
nothing delivery, Kemp gets in line and thuds it down to long-on, easy single to end the over
bowled from round the wicket - punched off the back-foot to the point region
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Hall goes for the drive, ball clips the outer half of the bat and rolls away towards cover
slightly short, again coming in width the angle - Kemp goes for the pull and is beaten by the lack of bounce
200 comes up! another short ball - again bowled from round the stump, Kemp just swings across the line and gets it on the middle. Long-on fielder had no chance of cutting it off
even better - another massive swing and the ball sails over the long-on fence. Kemp on the rampage here - South Africa racing away at this stage
down the leg side

goodness me - another meaty blow and once again the ball sails over the fielder at long-on. It was a good length delivery - Kemp just picked up the length and hit through the line with clinical precision
cut away behind point and two more runs are added to the total - 250 on the cards now.
under pressure Agarkar drops it touch short - that's a dreadful line on this track and Hall packs it away to the backward square leg fence
short ball, probably the slower one - Hall goes for the pull but fails to connect
but not this time - width offered outside the off stump and Hall slaps it through point for the second boundary of the over - what a partnership
driven away to deep extra cover, just a single on this occasion
beaten outside the off stump by a slower delivery - Last four overs have produced 57 runs with 30 coming off the last two.
played away towards midwicket and the single brings Kemp back on strike
this is murder! fulltoss on the middle and leg stump line, hammered over midwicket for yet another six - crowd goes wild
another fulltoss! Khan is clearly struggling here - on the middle and off stump line on this occasion and Kemp dismisses it over the long-on fence. Catch that if you can
down the leg side, safe delivery
fuller length delivery, driven down to long-on for just a single
another one down the leg side - another safe delivery
driven down to long-on, fumble in the deep by Kartick gives away an extra run
glanced away off the pads to the square leg region
short and wide outside the off stump, Hall goes back and cuts it away to sweeper cover
punched down to long-on for a single
short delivery, coming in with the angle - Hall goes for the pull and the ball rolls away off the inner half of the bat
from 76 for 6 to 250 for 7 - what a turnaround! swung away to deep midwicket, again just a single - good over so far from Agarkar
driven away to deep cover for a single
half-volley outside the off stump - right in the slot and Kemp thuds it past the fielder at cover
punched down the ground for a single - and this is now the new world record for the 8th wicket partnership
short and angling across - Kemp swing across the line and gets beaten by a long way
came off the inner half of the bat, no room for a single there
oversteps and Kemp fails to make contact
Kemp continues to pepper the ozone layer! another one lands in the slot and a massive hit though the line takes the ball over the long-on fence. This is easily the biggest hit of them all
driven away towards cover, ball falls short of the fielder there and they scamper through for a single
swung away to the midwicket region and that's his fifty - Andrew Hall, take a bow
short ball, coming in with the angle - Kemp walks down the track and pulls it away to deep midwicket, not a well timed shot and he moves to 99 with that single
fulltoss, driven wide through midwicket
there it is! pitched up outside the off stump and Kemp taps it away behind point - that's his maiden ODI hundred - his second fifty coming in just 22 balls. What a player.
one more for the road - good length delivery outside the off stump and Hall drills it through cover - excellent placement and the fielders in the deep had no chance of cutting it off
fuller length delivery, driven away to wide long-off for a single.

inn2.comm: short of a good length delivery, bit of shape in, defended with a straight bat
and he goes past the outside edge straigtaway - bit of extra bounce and close to the off stump line - Sehwag was clueless
on the middle and leg stump line, Sehwag shuffles across a bit and works it away towards square leg

and gone! short and wide outside the off stump. Sehwag goes for the cut and the ball flies off the top edge, done in by the extra bounce there -  Andrew Hall sprints across in the deep and takes a fine tumbling catch - Pollock strikes in the very first over, Sehwag walks back for a duck.
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended watchfully
starts off with a short rising delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and coming in with the angle. Dravid taps it away towards cover point
again coming in with the angle, no shot offered
pitched up and Dravid drives it straight back to the bowler
beaten - short of a good length delivery with a hint of inswing at the tail end, Dravid had no option but to play at it and the ball zips past the outside edge
good length delivery, this one nipped back in after hitting the deck and hits Dravid on the pad - loud appeal for lbw turned down. Missing leg for sure
forced away behind point, quick single to end the over
good length delivery. Seaming in nicely and Dravid plays it away towards cover
slightly short, again coming in with the angle - Dravid stands tall on the back-foot and punches it away towards point
width offered outside the off stump and Tendulkar goes for the cut, ball clips the bottom edge and goes straight into the ground
line and length delivery outside the off stump. Tendulkar leaves it through to the keeper
short ball, again the extra-bounce comes into play. Tendulkar watches the ball till the last moment and shoulders arms
beaten - slightly short and in the channel, Tendulkar has a poke at it and the ball goes past the outside edge
angled in from wide outside the off stump, defended on the back-foot
again short and coming in with the angle - Dravid gets on top of the bounce and taps it away on the off side
short rising delivery, bowled from wide of the crease and coming in with the angle - Dravid hops into position and defends it down on the off side
again banged in short - Dravid finds the gap between point and cover
good length delivery, cutting in - Dravid goes back to defend and ends up with and inside edge onto the pad
short and angled in, defended standing tall
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight to the fielder at extra cover. A well timed shot but the placement was poor
Pollock drifts onto middle and leg - Tendulkar stays back and works it away straight to the fielder place in front of square leg
good length delivery, Tendulkar quickly gets into position and drives it through the gap between cover and mid-off
Pollock strikes again! short delivery and Tendulkar pulls it straight to Bowman at square leg. The ball was there to be hit but he miserably failed to keep it down.
left alone outside the off stump
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Kaif leaves it through to the keeper
short and cutting in, defended standing tall on the back-foot
short of a good length delivery, coming in with the angle - needless to say, I know. Dravid gets on top of the bounce and defends it with a straight bat
similar line and length - Dravid once again takes it on the back-foot
short rising delivery, Dravid on the back-foot defending
once again Ntini hits the coin outside the off stump and the ball comes in with the angle - Dravid hops into position presents the full face of the bat - solid defense
pushed back down the track and that's a maiden
off-cutter, defended watchfully
punched back down the track
good length delivery outside the off stump, punched down to mid-off
and he slips in the fuller length delivery, Kaif falls right into the trap and goes for the drive - luckily for him the ball fell just short of the fielder at extra cover
short and drifting down the leg side, pulled away behind square on the leg side - not a well timed shot and the ball came of the edge
driven down to mid-off
on the middle and off stump line, Kaif shuffles across a long way and defends it down to mid-on
harmless delivery outside the off stump - Kaif not interested
this one hit the deck and came back in sharply - turned away straight to the fielder at short square leg
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
pitched up outside the off stump, in the slot and Kaif drives it through the gap between the cover fielders.
drifting onto middle and leg, Dravid gets inside the line and turns it away straight to the fielder at midwicket
good length delivery, seaming in from close to the off stump line, Kaif is sucked forward and beaten by the angle - loud, confident appeal for lbw turned down - probably bit high
another good delivery outside the off stump, Kaif pulls away late
goes for the pull and gets it high on the bat, they scamper back for the second
bit of width offered outside the off stump and Kaif bludgeons it to the backward point fence - good positive hit
and Pollock gets his revenge.  Excellent off-cutter, Kaif goes for the pull, ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the woodwork
good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
worked away towards midwicket
pitched up outside the off stump, Karthik is sucked forward into the drive and the ball zips past the outside edge
good length delivery outside the off stump, Karthik shoulders arms
cutting in, Karthik gets forward and works it away towards midwicket
short of a good length delivery, turned away towards square leg
solid defensive shot and the ball rolls away towards cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, forced away off the back-foot to the point region
short of a length and coming in with the angle, defended watchfully
forced away off the back-foot
off-cutter, defended on the front-foot
width offered outside the off stump and Dravid goes for the cut and the ball rips past the edge - beaten by the extra bounce there
punched straight back down the track to the mid-on region. End of another good over for South Africa - India 19 for 3 after 10 overs, it's the same old story - some might say
good length delivery, defended on the back-foot
short and wide outside the off stump, once again Dravid fails to make contact
good length delivery on the stumps, Dravid shuffles across and tucks it away behind square on the leg side - there was a single in the offing but Karthik is not interested - can't blame him
driven down to mid-off
short of a good length delivery, Dravid gets inside the line and taps it away behind square on the leg side
decent delivery - Karthik leaves it through to the keeper
in the channel outside the off stump, driven straight to the man at mid-off
Pollock drifts onto the the pads, a rare bad delivery - Dravid wristfully turns it away to fine leg for an easy single
good length delivery, solid defensive shot and the ball rolls away on the off side
again defended watchfully
where did that come from! good length delivery outside the off stump, bit of width offered - Karthik steps forward and hits it over the fielder at mid-off. Clean hit - Pollock is not amused.
worked away off the back-foot to the midwicket region
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended on the front-foot
driven off the back-foot, nice wristy shot but the ball goes straight to the fielder at point
Hall pulls it back and angles it in, Dravid stays back and tucks it away towards midwicket
forced away off the back-foot -  gets it into the gap between the cover fielders and they scamper through for a single
another solid hit through the line and the ball clears the man at mid-off
shot! Hall drags it short and Karthik pulls it over the square leg fence. Got right on top of the bounce and just went through with the swing - excellent timing and placement.
fuller and on the stumps, worked away towards midwicket
glanced away off the pads to the fine leg region
short rising delivery, angled in from wide outside the off stump - Karthik goes right back, gets on top of the bounce and defends it with a straight bat
good length delivery, defended on the back-foot
driven off the back-foot to the cover region, excellent full length diving stop from de Villiers saves runs
driven hard but straight to the fielder at cover
another solid drive, this time the ball goes straight to the fielder at mid-off
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Dravid leans well forward - head over the ball and drives it straight to the fielder at mid-on
off-cutter, slightly short and Dravid takes it on the back-foot
short of a good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Dravid stands tall on the back-foot and turns it away through midwicket for a brace - excellent use of the wrist
driven straight to the fielder at cover
forced away off the back-foot to the cover region, Karthik takes off searching for the single but Dravid sends him back
wayward delivery down the leg side and Dravid effortlessly flicks it away to the fine leg fence - as easy as it gets
turned away well in front of square leg, no room for a single there
four down! short of a good length, bit off extra bounce and zing  - Karthik leaves his bat hanging in the air to dry and the edge goes straight to Smith at second slip.
inside edge onto the pad
short ball, defended on the back-foot
off the mark in style - fuller in length and wide outside the off stump - Dhoni gets well forward and hammers it over the wide long-off fence
better line and length, forced away towards cover point
worked away off the back-foot to the square leg region
good length delivery, Dravid gets into position and nudges it away towards point
defended outside the off stump
short of a length and angling in, Dravid pushes forward and defends it well

pitched up and angling in, Dravid gets right behind the line and drives it hard into the ground.  Ball goes over the bowler after hitting the deck. Mid-off takes his time and that allows the ball to race away to the long-off fence
better line and length, Dravid is forced to defend
swing and a miss outside the off stump - Dhoni looking to attack here
off-cutter, defended back to the bowler
short rising delivery, bowled from wide of the crease and coming in with the angle - Dhoni goes right back and defends it with a straight bat
slightly short and again angled in - Dhoni goes for the pull but fails to make contact - ball hits him on the stomach and rolls away on the leg side
driven away towards cover
another typical Ntini delivery - short and angled in from wide of the crease. Dravid gets right on top of the bounce and defends it down on the leg side

driven away off the front-foot to cover point - de Villiers moves across to his left - pounces on the ball and in one neat action takes a shy at the bowler's end stumps - had he hit Dravid would have been history. Amazing effort.
down the leg side
slower delivery, Dhoni pushes forward and lofts it over extra cover
driven through cover for two more
bit of extra bounce and Dhoni gets hit on the glove - that hurts
short of a good length delivery, Dhoni gets on top of the bounce and taps it down to mid-off
drifting down the leg side. Dhoni goes after it and ends up with a leading edge to short cover
starts off with a fuller length delivery, driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
wicket to wicket delivery, driven down to mid-on for a chance
short of a good length delivery, cutting in from wide outside the off stump - Dravid stays back and tucks it away straight to the fielder at square leg
good length delivery, seaming in - Dravid gets behind the line and punches it away towards cover
full and on the pads, nicely flicked away through square leg for a single
forced away off the back-foot and the ball goes straight to the fielder at backward point
turned away off the back-foot to the square leg region
short of a good length delivery, Dhoni goes back-and-across and punches it away towards cover. Awkward looking shot
glanced away off the back-foot to the short fine leg region
defended on the back-foot
short of a good length and coming in with the angle - defended
down the leg side
short and angling in - defended standing tall on the back-foot
driven down to long-off, easy single added to the total

good length delivery outside the off stump, Dravid stretches well forward - gets close to the pitch of the delivery and drives it through extra cover. Nice flowing drive and the placement was spot on - no stopping that
worked away on the leg side
shapes up for the pull and changes his mind at the last moment
pitched up and driven straight back to the bowler
on the middle and leg stump line, Dhoni shuffles across and tucks it away behind square on the leg side
drifting down the leg side. Glanced away to fine leg where a diving effort from Ntini cuts off a certain boundary
in the slot and smashed through point - Gibbs hardly got anytime to react
worked away for an easy single
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven down to mid-off
slightly short and coming in with the angle. Dravid shuffles across, gets on top of the bounce and defends it down on the leg side
good length delivery outside the off stump, bit wide and Dhoni had to reach out for it - find the gap between mid-off and extra cover
turned away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
pulled away through square leg
bouncer and Dhoni ducks under it
driven straight to the fielder at cover
angled in from wide of the crease - Dhoni gets forwad and taps it straight down the track to the mid-on region
pitches on a shortish length on middle and leg, worked right to midwicket
short outside off stump, Dravid stands tall and defends into the covers
slightly short outside off stump, Dravid flays at that and Gibbs at backward point pulls off an amazing, athletic save...treat to watch
banged in really short and its sails down the leg side, wide called&
short of a good length on middle and leg, Dravid is tucked up and works that to midwicket
pitches on a fuller length outside off stump, tempting Dhoni to drive but he resists
fuller again, this time Dhoni comes forward to the pitch of it and drives into the covers, but sends Dravid back after taking a step down the track
short and wide, Dravid stands and runs that down to Hall at third man
banged in short and drifts down leg, Dhoni reacts slowly but manages to pick up one off the hips to wide of square leg
pitches on a shortish length outside off stump and moves in, Dravid drops the hands on it softly and wants the quick single, but as cover swoops in and Dhoni resists, he plays it safe
short and wide and moving into him, and he swivels on the pull and picks up a single past square leg, wasnt timed too well and was hit into the ground
dropped in short moving down middle and leg, Dhoni ducks into it as it sails over his left shoulder, wide not given
this time its back of a good length outside off stump and Dhoni hops in his crease and keeps it down into the ground for Gibbs to move in and collect from backward point
short and angled into his ribs, he easily whips that off the hips but cant beat square leg
full outside off stump, asking for trouble, firmly struck but Dravid cant beat Pollock at mid-off
short and angling in once more, this time Dravid works that off the hips in the gap at square leg, runs hard and picks up a brace, nicely done
short and wide, moving into him, Dravid leans back and opens the face of the bat, runs it towards point where Gibbs dives, gets a hand on it, but allows a run
lands on a good length outside off stump, Dhoni comes on top of it and pushes it back past Kallis, Pollock moves from mid-off and fields
shot! Pitches slightly full, not a half-volley though, and Dhoni just frees the arms and tees-off over cover for maximum, thats the 50th six of his career
lands shorter this time, he drives that to cover
wow, wow, wow! Dragged in short outside off stump and Dhoni instantly picks that up with some power and slams it high and handsome over midwicket for another six, superb stroke from the man
dropped in short on middle and leg, Dhoni swivels into the pull and gets one down to fine leg
a good length ball on middle and leg, Dravid neatly clips that around the corner for one
close! Full and wide, Dhoni backs away a fraction and flays the bat at that one, the ball flies off the outer edge but lands short of Hall at third man, streaky but thats Dhoni for you
full and wide, Dhoni drives and gets a thick edge that sails past Boucher for four to third man
shorter on middle and leg, easily turned to square leg
SMOKED! That could be the biggest of the day! Full and wide outside off stump, and he nonchalantly lifts that from the spot it landed and sends it dead straight down the ground for six
shorter on middle and leg, worked into the leg side for one
full on the legs, easily turned past square leg for two, good running there
quicker, fuller delivery outside off stump, Dravid comes forward and tries to turn it fine, doesnt time it well and ends up driving back to Kemp all along the ground
full and wide outside off stump, Dhoni slams that powerfully down to Ntini at long-off
classic! A rank half-volley outside off stump, he just comes forward, to the pitch, and unleashes a textbook cover drive that beats the gap and races away to the fence
drifts to leg stump and its clipped into the midwicket region, Bosman fields and they get one

pulled and gone courtesy a superb catch! Dropped in short outside off stump, Dhoni's eyes light up and he pulls that hard and flat, looks like another boundary at least but there out of the blue comes Bosman running hard and fast to his left and he dives forward and picks that inches off the ground near the ropes, immense catch to end a fine innings
full outside off stump, Pathan drives down the ground and mid-off moves quickly and saves runs
full and moving across him, Pathan sees it through with a high lift of the bat
short and flat on middle and leg, tucked into the square leg region for one
moves around the wicket to the leftie and tosses it up outside off stump, Pathan cant time the drive well
tossed up again, this time Pathan gets to the pitch and drives that down to long-off to get off the mark
tossed up outside off stump and spins in, Dravid caught on the front foot, a loud appeal but umpire Jerling is unmoved, that looked very close to me, hitting middle and off maybe
flatter on middle and off, worked into the midwicket area for one
tossed up, Pathan comes forward and drives that to de Villiers at cover
short and wide, steered to Gibbs at backward point
short and wide again, some swing too, Pathan drives loosely and fails to make contact
shorter outside off stump, moves across him, left alone with a raise of the bat
quick and bouncing outside off stump, Pathan flays the bat but misses

gone! Bangs one in that moves across him, and he's tempted into a leaden-footed poke that takes the edge and flies hard and fast to Smith at lone slip, and he holds onto it above his head, good catch and Kallis has another, the tails exposed too
flat down the legs, easily tucked around the corner for two
flat again on the stumps, Dravid drives back to Smith
flat and slow through the air, Dravid goes back and punches that down to long-o for a single
tossed up and Harbhajan flat-bat swipes that across the line and picks up four to wide long-on
tossed up outside off stump, Harbhajan gets a step forward and then ends up checking the drive back to Smith
anticipating a fuller ball, he comes forward but Smith sees it and drops it short, Harbhajan goes back and ends up comically chopping that into the ground
short and wide, he stands on the toes and runs that down to third man to bring up his fifty
a good length on off stump, driven back to the bowler
fuller outside off stump, he comes onto the front foot and confidently drives to cover
banged in short outside off stump, Harbhajan hops and defends, rapped on the knuckles
short and moving down leg, he hops and pulls that down to fine leg for one
short and moving into him, Dravid hops and plays that down into the ground, very nearly onto the stumps but
full outside off stump, in the zone, and Harbhajan slams that over mid-on for four
full again, lofted down to long-on for one
full on off stump, Dravid drives that down to long-on for one
full again and this time he presents the full face of the bat back to the bowler
shorter outside off stump, he hops and defends that in front of point

gone! Fullish, slower ball outside off stump, and all he can do is roll the wrists and scoop that up in the air towards mid-on where Smith dives to his left and plucks that with his left hand as the ball died on him, end of the road for Harbhajan
full and wide of off stump, Dravid runs that down to third man for one
short of a good length outside off stump and moving in, Agarkar stands tall and defends back to Kallis
pitches on a good length on off stump, Agarkar defends back to Kallis, he's backing away marginally in his shots
short of a good length outside off stump, driven to cover
dropped in short, Agarkar ducks into it and gets slammed on the helmet, ball flies down to fine leg and they get runs
a good length outside off stump, played back to Kallis
Driven comfortably to cover
Short of a good length from Hall, Agarkar steps on the back foot and drives straight to mid-off
Straight ball, fullish this time. Agarkar swings clean and straight. Ball sails high and one bounce into the long-on fence
Airy waft to long-off, no run

Full ball on middle and leg. Agarkar loses a bit of balance, falls over and scoops it in the direction of midwicket where Smith times his jump to perfection, stretches his right hand and pulls off another beauty. They're catching them like champions now. The end seems very near
Superb inswinging yorker first up. Zaheer luckily gets some bat onto it and keeps it out
Back of a length, Dravid pushes it off the back foot straight to cover
Wide of off stump this time, Dravid cuts it easily for a single
On off stump, Zaheer tips to cover and scampers a single
Blocked cautiously
Full and straight, Dravid down the track and swings smoothly over long-on for a text-book six. Super shot but does it even matter?
Tucked to fine leg
full and wide, driven past cover for one to the sweeper
full on the stumps, driven to mid-on for one
short of a good length on the stumps, goes back and drives that down to long-on for one
short and wide, he stands up on his toes and chops that into the ground in front of point
full and moving into him, he shuffles and looks to drive down the ground, gets an inside edge perilously close to leg stump
full again, tries for the yorker but not accurate enough, and Zaheer checks the shot back to the bowler

banged in short outside off stump, Dravid goes for a hook but doesnt time it and gets a leading edge that balloons up and down to a diving Hall at deep backward square leg, who dives forward and plucks that inches before the ground, South Africa have been excellent with their catching today and Dravid's gritty innings comes to an end
good length ball outside off stump, beaten on the backfoot
fuller this time and he comes forward and pushes that to mid-off
full outside off stump, a slower ball, Zaheer comes forward and then leaves it
short ball outside off stump, Zaheer sways out of the line of the ball
slower ball, the off cutter this time, full and beats Zaheer as he comes forward
quick and full into middle and leg, driven back to Hall
full again, good movement on that one, he drives and gets an inside edge, Boucher moves forward and stops it

all over at Newlands! Full-pitched delivery outside off stump, Kumble goes down on one knee and drives, gets an inside edge onto off stump and Hall celebrates with a pumped fist, a spin on the heels, and a happy walk back to the dressing room
